random.alt: A placeholder image with an arbitrary aspect ratio.

square.alt: A placeholder image with a perfect square (1:1) aspect ratio.

tv.alt: A placeholder image with a 4:3 aspect ratio, like an old TV.

widescreen.alt: A placeholder image with a 16:9 aspect ratio, like a widescreen TV.

logo.alt: A test image for a logo with an arbitrary aspect ratio.
